Uses of Package
org.apache.sis.referencing

  • Packages that use org.apache.sis.referencing 
    Package Description
    org.apache.sis.metadata.iso
    Root package for ISO 19115 metadata about resources (data or services).
    org.apache.sis.parameter
    Descriptions and values of parameters used by a coordinate operation or a process.
    org.apache.sis.referencing
    Base classes for reference systems used for general positioning.
    org.apache.sis.referencing.crs
    Coordinate Reference System (CRS) definitions as coordinate systems related to the earth through datum.
    org.apache.sis.referencing.cs
    Coordinate System (CS) definitions as the set of coordinate system axes that spans the coordinate space.
    org.apache.sis.referencing.datum
    Relationship of a CoordinateSystem (an abstract mathematical entity) to the earth or other system.
    org.apache.sis.referencing.gazetteer
    Mapping between geographic identifiers (addresses, grid indexes…) and locations (descriptions, coordinates…).
    org.apache.sis.referencing.operation
    Relationship between any two Coordinate Reference Systems (CRS).
  • Classes in org.apache.sis.referencing used by org.apache.sis.metadata.iso 
    Class Description
    ImmutableIdentifier
    Immutable value uniquely identifying an object within a namespace, together with a version.
  • Classes in org.apache.sis.referencing used by org.apache.sis.parameter 
    Class Description
    AbstractIdentifiedObject
    Base class for objects identified by a name or a code.
    Builder
    Base class of builders for various kind of IdentifiedObject.
  • Classes in org.apache.sis.referencing used by org.apache.sis.referencing 
    Class Description
    AbstractIdentifiedObject
    Base class for objects identified by a name or a code.
    Builder
    Base class of builders for various kind of IdentifiedObject.
    CommonCRS
    Frequently-used geodetic CRS and datum that are guaranteed to be available in SIS.
    CommonCRS.Temporal
    Frequently-used temporal CRS and datum that are guaranteed to be available in SIS.
    CommonCRS.Vertical
    Frequently-used vertical CRS and datum that are guaranteed to be available in SIS.
    GeodeticCalculator
    Performs geodetic calculations on a sphere or an ellipsoid.
    ImmutableIdentifier
    Immutable value uniquely identifying an object within a namespace, together with a version.
    NamedIdentifier
    An identification of a CRS object which is both a Identifier and a GenericName.
  • Classes in org.apache.sis.referencing used by org.apache.sis.referencing.crs 
    Class Description
    AbstractIdentifiedObject
    Base class for objects identified by a name or a code.
    AbstractReferenceSystem
    Description of a spatial and temporal reference system used by a dataset.
  • Classes in org.apache.sis.referencing used by org.apache.sis.referencing.cs 
    Class Description
    AbstractIdentifiedObject
    Base class for objects identified by a name or a code.
  • Classes in org.apache.sis.referencing used by org.apache.sis.referencing.datum 
    Class Description
    AbstractIdentifiedObject
    Base class for objects identified by a name or a code.
  • Classes in org.apache.sis.referencing used by org.apache.sis.referencing.gazetteer 
    Class Description
    AbstractIdentifiedObject
    Base class for objects identified by a name or a code.
    AbstractReferenceSystem
    Description of a spatial and temporal reference system used by a dataset.
    CommonCRS
    Frequently-used geodetic CRS and datum that are guaranteed to be available in SIS.
  • Classes in org.apache.sis.referencing used by org.apache.sis.referencing.operation

    Base class for objects identified by a name or a code.
